items.sentence: There wasn't enough room on the bus for all of us.
Tatoeba: Better to make no sense than no sentence!
This is the first time I've heard of this website.
Tom works for the Environmental Protection Agency.
I think Tom and Mary spend too much time together.
Tom was the architect that designed that building.
We won't be able to do anything without your help.
Remember that I'm doing this for Tom, not for you.
Tom doesn't have to do with everything by himself.
Some interesting questions came up in class today.
I have the feeling that I've answered this before.
I didn't realize both Tom and Mary had to do that.
I didn't know that Tom wasn't planning to do that.
I told Tom I didn't want to go to Boston with him.
I don't see anything wrong with what Tom is doing.
When was the last time you gave a gift to someone?
As you've already pointed out, that was a mistake.
It was very considerate of you to buy that for me.
You look like a guy who might put up a good fight.
Tom was holding a kitchen knife in his right hand.
I admire how you always manage to avoid arguments.
I hope that I haven't done anything inappropriate.
How old were you when you started learning French?
If I were younger, I'd go hiking with my children.
Tom usually sits just behind Mary in French class.
It was then that Tom realized that he'd lost Mary.
It's refreshing to take a shower after exercising.
All I really want to do is just sit here and read.
Tom didn't go because Mary said that he shouldn't.
You\'re a much better singer than Tom, aren\'t you?
You\'re more talkative than most of Tom\'s friends.
Tom promised to come, but he hasn\'t turned up yet.
Tom said he didn\'t want anything for his birthday.
Just observe your cat and you will get to know him.
Let me know when you get that report back from Tom.
You can\'t leave until you\'ve said goodbye to Tom.
Tom has already been arrested at least three times.
Tom has asked us to make sure we get there on time.
Tom has been living in Boston for almost ten years.
Tom has been studying French for about three years.
Tom has been to Australia more times than Mary has.
Tom has told me that same joke more than ten times.
Are you doing anything special for New Year\'s Eve?
Are you sure it\'s OK to leave Tom alone with Mary?
Are you sure you don\'t want to wait till tomorrow?
Are you telling me you don\'t know where Tom lives?
Tom slept for more than three hours this afternoon.
Tom whispered in Mary\'s ear how much he loved her.
Tom wouldn\'t dare show his face around here again.
Tom wouldn\'t eat what his mother put on the table.
